entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 10:19 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
